attributes.title: Ew.
attributes.review: Honestly I was worried because I read the reviews, and until I downloaded I was surprised that the reviews were right. Honestly worst app ever. Please take it off AppStore. It’s really bad.😡🙄

attributes.title: Low quality
attributes.review: All the features were very slow. That app couldn’t start before kicking me out. The facts on the app are racist and sexist. 🧚🏼‍♂️✨Trump 2020 but on a tombstone✨🧚🏼‍♂️

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever installed!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: i was eating mustard for breakfast when i decided to download this app. as soon as i opened it i couldn’t stop uncontrollably SHARTING. i RUINED my favorite pajama pants and it’s all this apps fault!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Hey Donnie
attributes.review: Me as an older white man in America I just wasn’t impressed by your app now Donnie I love u but your a racist bigot and should never have any power In the world and when u die I will be sure to spit on your grave 🥰

attributes.title: HORRIFIC
attributes.review: This app is truly terrible from its quality to who that app is run for.  This app needs to be seriously re-evaluated or at least taken down!!!

attributes.title: Trash🚨
attributes.review: ✨This caused my phone to glitch really bad, I always got spam message and notifications I highly advise people to not use this app✨

attributes.title: bad vibes
attributes.review: when i opened up the app to make fun of this fat cheeto of a president the app glitched and then my grandma fell down the stairs.  not only did that happen but when i was looking at something on the app and it glitched again my dog was hit by a one of a kind jeff bezos monster truck. this app is bad news like our president. don’t get the app and don’t vote for this pedo/rapist!!!

attributes.title: I’m disappointed
attributes.review: I really love my president but man this app wow it’s a big fail i don’t know why it’s so bad but I wish I could have left a higher review but I can’t.🧚🏻✨✨

disgusting, i can’t possibly explain how utterly disgusting it is that the app store genuinely let this app surface onto #6 in the news category. i think it should be removed from the app store. there are more 1 star ratings than any other so. we can genuinely see how hated this app is and how it’s a waste of space on our phones and mind so 🙈yea❤️

attributes.title: Would give 0 stars
attributes.review: Right as I opened the app I was greeted with disgustang things. The main one was trump. I nearly vomited! This app has him plastered all over it! I couldn’t bare it!
